subject: An English beauty tip & enjoy 20% off our Rosewater Collection
body:
Crabtree & Evelyn Email Exclusives




If you are not able to view this message, click here.
Please add Crabtree & Evelyn (crabtree@mailings.crabtree-evelyn.com) to your email address book.
















   


			A perennial favorite across the pond, rose water is an infusion of fresh rose petals and pure water.  Often blended with classic cold cream, rose water is loved by women with a truly English rose complexion.
			
			Our Rosewater collection - delicately scented with rosa damascena, one of the world's oldest roses -  is infused with soothing rose water and skin-comforting cold cream.  
			
Enjoy 20% off Rosewater Collection
			Use coupon code ROSEWATER at checkout

YOU'LL LOVE:
			• Rosewater Hand Therapy Cream
			• Rosewater Body Cream
			• Rosewater Scented Drawer Papers
 
 









CUSTOMER SERVICE  |  STORES  |  CONTACT  |  COMPANY  |  PRIVACY POLICY
FORWARD TO A FRIEND









TERMS & CONDITIONS FOR SPECIAL OFFERS ONLINE
		Offers valid at www.crabtree-evelyn.com. Enter coupon code ROSEWATER at checkout to receive discount. Not valid at Crabtree & Evelyn retail or outlet stores. 
		Please note that gifts with purchase will not show on your order at checkout but will be included automatically in your shipment when you purchase the required amount from any of our collections. We do not split orders. All items in one order will be sent to one shipping address. Offer is good while supplies last. May not be combined with other offers or coupons. Minimum purchase amount does not include taxes or shipping charges. Purchase of Gift Cards do not count toward special offer. Crabtree & Evelyn retains the right to substitute gift.
TERMS & CONDITIONS FOR FREE SHIPPING ON ORDERS OF $25 OR MORE
        Free shipping on orders of $25.00 or more and is valid online only. Shipping Offer applies to standard shipping only. Orders should take 3-7 days to arrive. All purchases are subject to bank authorization prior to processing. Only authorized purchases will be processed and shipped.
EMAIL EXCLUSIVES
        You are receiving this E-mail Exclusive from Crabtree & Evelyn because you requested it. Information provided to Crabtree & Evelyn is used solely for the purpose of providing you with product information and custom special offers. Your information is never sold, given to, or viewed by any third party. If you no longer wish to receive email from us or wish to update your subscription, click here to unsubscribe or update your address.
CRABTREE & EVELYN, 102 Peake Brook Road, Woodstock, CT 06281
